item.title: 100 Go Mistakes and How to Avoid Them
item.description: 21. Incorrectly initializing slices If you know the length of your new slice, then you should set an initial capacity for it.

item.title: Controller Orchestration Model in Controller Runtime Library
item.description: The controller-runtime library is utilized by numerous controller builders and templating engines (Kubebuilder, Operator SDK to name a few) to standardize the management of Kubernetes controllers.
